title: Why did i get a warning for this.
body: I got a warning yesterday , so I decided i need to make an effort to not say anything bad in the chat to get reported , said and done. Im playing a game , not going too well , my top laner is flaming my mid laner and my mid laner is flaming my support and top laner. Later on in the middle of our bad game I say 'The flame goes round and round' Now i'm getting picked on by my top laner 'Lee ur 3/6' 'WHY DO YOU AND ZIGGS KEEP DOING STUPID STUFF'. At the end of the game i say a report for you! and a report for you! I click my home button , You have been Reported for harrassment and verbal abuse. Really? I have not said much all game. Most of the things i said were ayyy after we killed some1. If somebody False reports me, why show it infront of my face. Just let it happen so i dont have anxiety of getting banned in the next 10 minutes.

replies.body:
Yes apparently saying in chat that you are reporting is against the rules from what I gather. But other than that, if you get reported and didn't deserve it then it doesn't count so. 
https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQxSPTxzWzgp6uM48i-HUqgngR8hgYv9o3tDwn0TTITMF-eFe9eQSI9pQ

The warnings are there so people know they are being reported. We tell you first, then we check the validity of reports. I understand this can be confusing at times, but if you didn't do anything wrong you have nothing to worry about. If the reports weren't valid, then you can disregard the message.

Maybe you should update the message. It **sounds** like you already validated it and it came out positive.

It doesn't simply inform you of being reported, it directly admonishes you for misbehaving.
This is a common complaint people have with the warnings and a rioter said a while ago they were working on it.

>[...] so I decided i need to make an effort to **not say anything bad in the chat** to get reported [...] **I say 'The flame goes round and round'**[... ]
[...] At the end of the game** i say a report for you! and a report for you!** [...]


There, I tell you why you get warning
People report for no reason to grief others, it happens all the time.
Calling reports is bannable and can skip punishments
